remarks: Element by element multiplication of a matrix with an identity matrix with a column replaced by a vector.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2019.) (Revised by AV, 26-Feb-2019.)
statement:
marepvcl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
marepvcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
marepvcl.v $e |- V = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m N ) $.
ma1repvcl.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) $.
mulmarep1el.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mulmarep1el.e $e |- E = ( ( .1. ( N matRepV R ) C ) ` K ) $.
mulmarep1el $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ C e. V /\ K e. N ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N /\ L e. N ) ) -> ( ( I X L ) ( .r ` R ) ( L E J ) ) = if ( J = K , ( ( I X L ) ( .r ` R ) ( C ` L ) ) , if ( J = L , ( I X L ) , .0. ) ) ) $.
